article_tables.title: Overview
rows: Type: Utility Power Cost: $800Recharge Time: 4:30All friendly ground infantry in the target area rapidly regenerate health for 28 secondsLeft-click icon then left-click on target location

Type: Utility PowerCost: $1000Recharge Time: 5:30Replaces Regen Drugs when a Cloning Vats is builtAll friendly ground infantry in the target area rapidly regenerate health for 42 secondsLasts longer than Regen DrugsLeft-click icon then left-click on target location

Type: Defensive PowerCost: $500Recharge Time: 5:00Deploys a Tank Bunker anywhere on the battlefieldThe Tank Bunker gains a 40% armor boost after deployment that lasts 40 secondsLeft-click icon then left-click on target location (cannot be targeted on water)
